tout.title: Bill Orcutt artist image

title: Made Out of Sound
socialTitle: Chris Corsano /  Bill Orcutt: Made Out of Sound
dek: Refusing to be hemmed in by quarantine, the veteran improvisers took the unusual path of recording separately: drums first, then overdubbed guitars. The results are genuinely life-affirming.
seoDescription: Refusing to be hemmed in by quarantine, the veteran improvisers took the unusual path of recording separately: drums first, then overdubbed guitars. The results are genuinely life-affirming.

tout.title: Pink Siifu / Fly Anakin: $mokebreak EP

title: $mokebreak EP
dek: The pair’s second record of lo-fi rap collaborations is technically bulletproof, the bars masterfully patterned and relayed with gusto. Still, the songs don’t always fulfill their potential.
